song.title: Edward Teller
song.info:
Lyrics (with repetitions omitted):
I am not Edward Teller My conscience does not grow on trees And even though it clearly doesn't count I want you all to understand my argument
I am not Edward Teller I see red, yellow, blue and white And even though it clearly doesn't matter I show my plans for anyone to hear
You are not Edward Teller You do not have to prove it to yourself And even though you cannot change your talent You will achieve what others seldom reach
They are not Edward Teller And neither cause nor reason they will see And even though they will say it's annoying It's just a lousy piece of poetry
